content: here s a quick little project that s perfect for teacher s gifts stocking stuffers and lots more the coasters work up quickly and by putting two together you can make a pouch for a little treat too make a collection for your christmas tree decorations my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures stitch guides and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info coupon codes and giveaways www facebook com/patternparadise follow my blog www pattern-paradise com text and images c the pattern paradise all rights reserved for more information see http //pattern-paradise com
